languages.text: "Ваше предложение не столь легко принять и еще сложнее выполнить, господин ван Калокс. Но я рад, что ваш визит не продиктован иными причинами... как в прошлые два раза".
"Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
languages.original_text: "Ваше предложение не столь легко принять и еще сложнее выполнить, господин ван Калокс. Но я рад, что ваш визит не продиктован иными причинами... как в прошлые два раза".

traits.locale_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
"Your offer is not so easy to accept and even less so to honour. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
"Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
"Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
"Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."
"Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

languages.text: 「ヴァン・カロックス殿、その要望は理解しがたいし、どう敬意を示せばいいのやら。しかし、今回の来訪に他には理由がないと聞いて安心したよ…過去2回の訪問とは違うのだな」
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァン・カロックス殿、その要望は理解しがたいし、どう敬意を示せばいいのやら。しかし、今回の来訪に他には理由がないと聞いて安心したよ…過去2回の訪問とは違うのだな」

languages.text: “你的请求很难理解，更难以兑现，冯·卡洛克斯大师。不过，我很高兴听到，你这次拜访没有什么特别的原因……不像前两次那样。”
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: “你的请求很难理解，更难以兑现，冯·卡洛克斯大师。不过，我很高兴听到，你这次拜访没有什么特别的原因……不像前两次那样。”

languages.text: «Su petición difícil resulta de comprender y aún más de cumplir, maestro van Calox. Me alegra saber, eso sí, que esta visita no atiende a razones ulteriores... a diferencia de las dos anteriores».
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: «Su petición resulta de comprender y aún más de cumplir, maestro van Calox. Me alegra saber, eso sí, que esta visita no atiende a razones ulteriores... a diferencia de las dos anteriores».

languages.text: « Je ne vois pas comment je pourrais honorer votre requête, qui me dépasse d'ailleurs complètement, maître van Calox. Mais je suis ravi d'apprendre que votre visite n'a rien de personnel... à la différence des deux précédentes. »
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois pas comment je pourrais honorer votre requête, qui me dépasse d'ailleurs complètement, maître van Calox. Mais je suis ravi d'apprendre que votre visite n'a rien de personnel... à la différence des deux précédentes. »

languages.text: "Euer Ersuchen ist schwer zu verstehen und noch schwerer zu erfüllen, Meister van Calox. Aber ich bin froh, dass es keine anderen Gründe für Euren Besuch gibt ... anders als bei den zwei vorangegangenen."
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Ersuchen ist schwer zu verstehen und noch schwerer zu erfüllen, Meister van Calox. Aber ich bin froh, dass es keine anderen Gründe für Euren Besuch gibt ... anders als bei den zwei vorangegangenen."

languages.text: "Talebinizi anlamak zor, onurlandırmak ise daha da zor Üstat van Calox. Fakat bu ziyaretinizin, önceki iki ziyaretinizden farklı bir nedeni olduğunu duyduğuma sevindim."
languages.original_text: "Your request is difficult to fathom and even more so to honour, Master van Calox. But I'm glad to hear there aren't other reasons for this visit... unlike your two previous ones."

traits.locale_text: "Talebinizi anlamak zor, onurlandırmak ise daha da zor Üstat van Calox ama bu ziyaretinizin, önceki iki ziyaretinizden farklı bir nedeni olduğunu duyduğuma sevindim."
